data.title: Colonel Chabert (1920 film)
data.text:
Colonel Chabert (German: Oberst Chabert) is a 1920 German silent historical film directed by and starring Eugen Burg. It is an adaptation of HonorÃ© de Balzac's 1832 novel Colonel Chabert.
